subject: Adobe Photoshop ready to download
body:
Advertising is the principal reason why the business person has come to inherit the earth.
Adversities do not make a man frail. They show what sort of man he is.
Better to light one small candle than to curse the darkness.
When it is not necessary to change, it is necessary not to change.
If it wasn't for dogs, some people would never go for a walk.
We grow small trying to be great.
Every adversity, every failure, every heartache carries with it the seed of an equal or greater benefit.
Thought is the blossom language the bud action the fruit behind it.
Winning starts with beginning.
Depression is rage spread thin.
Applause is the spur of noble minds, the end and aim of weak ones.
The original ''crime'' of ''niggers'' and lesbians is that they prefer themselves.
Analysis kills spontaneity. The grain once ground into flour springs and germinates no more.
If you can run one business well, you can run any business well.
How happy is the sailor's life, from coast to coast to roam in every port he finds a wife, in every land a home.
Fame is the thirst of youth.
We do not count a man's years until he has nothing else to count.
Getting divorced just because you don't love a man is almost as silly as getting married just because you do.
The universe seems bankrupt as soon as we begin to discuss the characters of individuals.
